gold_021_line_078: tˈi ʔˈajin mekˈal ɡeʔˈel miʁˈaχ dˈeʃ kˈalim beʃanˈa.
gold_021_line_079: vefˈilˈa haʔˈaʁχat ʔelɡˈun midˈot ʃehˈu χavʁˈa letˈoj letˈat sibuʁˈu ʃemenasˈe lekadˈem filˈan tʁˈopiʔˈa ʔeχektˈivit.
